mapper.select: /* SmsChargeMapper.getMsgOneAmtGuideList */ SELECT FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('SMS', #{orgnCd}) AS SMS_ONE_AMT, -- TB_CM_NMCODE.NMCODE_GRP_CD = '222' FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('LMS', #{orgnCd}) AS LMS_ONE_AMT, FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('MMS', #{orgnCd}) AS MMS_ONE_AMT, FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('ALK', #{alkChargeOrgnCd}) AS ALK_ONE_AMT, FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('ALK_SMS', #{alkChargeOrgnCd}) AS ALK_SMS_ONE_AMT, FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('ALK_LMS', #{alkChargeOrgnCd}) AS ALK_LMS_ONE_AMT, FN_GET_SMS_UPRC('ALK_MMS', #{alkChargeOrgnCd}) AS ALK_MMS_ONE_AMT FROM dual

/* SmsChargeMapper.getRestSmsAmtAlimSettingList */ SELECT NVL(MAX(cst.RM_SMS_AMT), null) AS RM_SMS_AMT, SBPENC.D(cst.TEL_NO) AS TEL_NO, 0 AS EMPTY --데이터 없을때 때문에 FROM CET_SMSPT_T cst WHERE 1=1 AND cst.OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} GROUP BY cst.TEL_NO
mapper.insert: /* SmsChargeMapper.getRestSmsAmtAlimSettingSaveMerge */ MERGE INTO CET_SMSPT_T USING DUAL ON ( OGN_CD = #{orgnCd} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET RM_SMS_AMT_YN = #{rmSmsAmtYn}, ZERO_SMS_AMT_YN = #{zeroSmsAmtYn}, RM_SMS_AMT = #{rmSmsAmt}, TEL_NO = SBPENC.E(#{telNo}), MOD_DT = #{modDt}, MOD_ID = #{modId} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( OGN_CD, SMS_QTY, REG_DT, REG_ID, MOD_DT, MOD_ID, SMS_AMT, RM_SMS_AMT_YN, ZERO_SMS_AMT_YN, RM_SMS_AMT, TEL_NO ) VALUES ( #{orgnCd}, 0, #{regDt}, #{regId}, #{modDt}, #{modId}, 0, #{rmSmsAmt}, #{rmSmsAmtYn}, #{zeroSmsAmtYn}, '' )
